detail_desc: Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, long raglan sleeves, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, long raglan sleeves, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Semi-shiny tights with a push-up effect on the bum and a firm sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and thighs. 30 denier.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reflective uppers and reinforced palm sections. Elastication and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in microfibre with lace details. Lined cups, a wrapover front for easier nursing access and a wide, elasticated hem. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in microfibre with lace details. Lined cups, a wrapover front for easier nursing access and a wide, elasticated hem. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Short-sleeved lace top with an opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Partly lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Detachable belt with a round plastic buckle, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Detachable belt with a round plastic buckle, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, a small fabric appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved boiler suit in cotton twill with notch lapels, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, patch front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, ankle-length legs with elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Playsuit in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative bow at the front.
Calf-length skirt in tulle with a flock-print pattern. High waist with wide elastication. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in patterned satin. V-neck at the front with gathered elastication for a draped effect, long sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Dungaree dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a round neck, wide flounce over the shoulders and a rounded hem with a small embroidered appliqué at the front.

Romper suit in a cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, buttons down the front, elastication at the top of the back and elasticated hems.
Romper suit in a cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, buttons down the front, elastication at the top of the back and elasticated hems.
Romper suit in a cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, buttons down the front, elastication at the top of the back and elasticated hems.

Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, a small pocket on one leg and covered elastication at the hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims. V-neck opening at the top, a round neckline with twisted ties and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.

Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect, and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Set with one hair clip, two hair grips and a pair of earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads. Length of earrings approx. 4 cm, length of hair clip 6 cm, length of hair grips approx. 8.5 cm.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the hem of the skirt for added volume. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the hem of the skirt for added volume. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.

Three hair clips and two pairs of earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length of hair clips 7-8 cm, length of earrings 2 cm and 4.5 cm.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length approx. 6 cm.

Long, wide dress in an airy weave with a grandad collar, buttons at the top and long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Jersey inner dress.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a polo neck, long sleeves and double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
